EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to follow up and thank you for taking my call to discuss Shell Fleet Solutions. It was great to learn more about your business, and I’m convinced that you will find great value in our innovative card program.
Just to recap, here are our core pillars, and all the ways they will save your business money:
Savings
No set up, monthly or annual fees Save 10¢ per gallon for first 90 days Shell Fleet Navigator® cardholders save up to 5¢ per gallon at Shell and non-Shell locations Shell Fleet Plus™ cardholders save up to 6¢ per gallon at Shell stations
Security
Reduce the risk of fraud with an advanced payment network Cancel a lost or stolen card in real time Cut back on misuse with best-in-class data reporting
Convenience
Dedicated support team available 24/7/365 Easy setup with our implementation team Shell Fleet Navigator® is accepted at 95% of U.S. fueling stations and 45,000 service locations Shell Fleet Plus® and Shell Small Business™ are accepted at 14,000+ Shell stations
Control
Limit employee spending at the product level Establish spending restrictions based on hours of the day and dollars per time period Set purchasing permissions for products based on authorization class
I’ll plan to follow up with you next week regarding more ways Shell Fleet Solutions will save your business time and money. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or {!User.Email} .
I look forward to speaking again soon.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
